overview.ovdesc:
IM DOCUMENT IMAGE REFERENCE IM.REFERENCE
This application, which is read only, is used to link all IM.DOCUMENT.IMAGE records by IMAGE.REFERENCE. The key is the IMAGE.REFERENCE, prefixed by the company mnemonic if relevant. The record contains one IM.DOCUMENT.IMAGE key per field. This application is used to provide look up facilities when images relating to an application field value, or key are being searched for.

desc.p: The key can be in one of the following formats: CCC_XXXXXXXXXXXXXXX or XXXXXXXXXXXXXXXX Where: CCC_ is the Company Mnemonic from the relevant IM.DOCUMENT.IMAGE record and XXXXXXXXXXXXXXXX is a unique IM.DOCUMENT.IMAGE IMAGE.REFERENCE value
